resume_extraction.prompt: Given the resume text Resume: {resume_text}. extract the data.

expected_output.name: John Doe
expected_output.objective: I am a dedicated professional with a strong work ethic and a passion for continuous learning and development. I thrive in dynamic environments and aim to contribute to the success of any organization by leveraging my skills and knowledge.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Troubleshooted and resolved bugs reported by clients and QA teams.

projects.name: Project Atlas
projects.description: Project Atlas is a web-based platform that facilitates real-time collaboration and project management for teams. It includes features such as task tracking, file sharing, and team communication.
keyFeatures: Task Management: Enables users to create, assign, and track tasks efficiently.
Real-Time Collaboration: Facilitates seamless communication and collaboration among team members.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform that offers a user-friendly interface for shopping and secure payment processing.
keyFeatures: Product Catalog: A searchable and sortable product catalog for easy browsing.
Secure Payments: Integration with popular payment gateways to ensure secure transactions.

projects.name: Mobile Banking App
projects.description: A mobile banking application that provides users with convenient and secure access to their banking services.
keyFeatures: Account Management: Allows users to view account balances, transaction history, and transfer funds.
Security Features: Implements multi-factor authentication and encryption for enhanced security.

expected_output.profile: Adaptable and quick to learn new skills. Have initiative and can work independently or as part of a team. Get on well with people at all levels, easily making good working relationships. Energetic, dynamic, and achievement-driven.

resume_generation.prompt: Given the following resume and job description, generate a tailored resume that highlights relevant skills and experience for the job. Resume: {resume_json}. Job Description: {job_description}

expected_output.name: John Doe

cover_letter_generation.prompt: Based on the following resume and job description, generate a professional cover letter. Resume: {resume_json}. Job Description: {job_description}
cover_letter_generation.expected_output:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the [Job Title] position at [Company Name]...

skill_extraction.prompt: Extract a list of professional skills from the following text: {resume_text}

phone_number_extraction.prompt: Extract the phone number from the following text: {resume_text}
